page.title: 11FIGHTING DRUG ADDICTION
page.content: On Tuesday 18 June 1985 the minister for Stockethill church came to talk to us about his work. He often helps people who are drug addicts. The most abused drug in Aberdeen is alcohol.Other drugs you can become addicted to are heroine, cocaine and marijuana.The minister goes to meetings in Edinburgh and also talks to children at an early age about the dangers of drugs to prevent so many children becoming addicts. Sometimes he goes to the homes of young addicts to talk to their parents about how to cope with the problem.I think his job is very important.
